answers.answer: hi lala,Are they doing a pelvic exam and a pap smear??? doing both should tell u what is going on. If they treated u for chlymidia etc. Then they should retest to see if that went away... U could also be having chronic yeast infections. I'm a suffer from chronic yeast infections and I go back and forth between yeast and bacteria because of taking so many antibiotics this year. also have them test u for  diabetes or anything that could be causing u to have a weekend immune system that can also be y the discharge is not going away. Hopefully this helpedAngel

question: I have been taken anitiobotc for the past 6 months and my symptom hasn't change. My doctor said at first that i had vaginitis, another doctor said i had BV and the one i see now say i have a yeast infection and trichomonas. Early this year  i gotten treated for chlamydia and Gonorrhea because my ex said his doctor didn't tell him what he had so they treated him for that condition. My question is have been taking metronizole and bactrim and other antibotic, 1.why isn't my white discharge hasn't clear up yet? 2. Is my doctor not running the right test or giving me the right medication. and 3. Is all this medication of antibotic they being giving me from january making me have an yeast or bacteria infection. Please help i'm so scared and confuse!!!!!!!
title: please help! need advice soon
